values: Somethin' old I dug up :) There's a Hesitance When you say you love me And your heart doesn't beat as fast As it once did When we're all wrapped up Limbs spilling over the wode Of the double bed And when I kiss you you always Close your eyes Whereas before you said to stare into the blue of mine Was a look into heaven and beyond And when we lay there with nothing to say No longer do you draw Imaginary intricate patterns On my skin that used to tremble at your touch And my heart beats quickly for I am afraid Of losing you And being Alone Again. Let's go back to endless summer nights Where on the pretense of heat We would shed our clothes And just worship the othes body My pillarr of strength you seem to be melting With the icy looks you give me.
http://sugarsweet1983.livejournal.com/6650.html

I went grocery shopping.. boring... LoL and got the Alecia Key's CD. I love this girl! She rocks and of course - she's stunning. But yeah, going out clubbing tonight......... im all excited to dress like a whore. hahahaha More later. Rachel My phone rang today Walking through the supermarket Frozen peas staring at me I knew it was you. I stammered I breathed so quick I felt alone to hear your voice Trying to make you believe That I don't miss a thing. Slow beat's singing in my head I just can't let you go You sound so far away And I find my fingers tracing your name On the glass of the freezers As the pizzas starve for warth Like me. You ask me how it's going And the softness in my reply gives me away And you pause And you take a breathe And I die to hear you admit You love me. It's an eternity I don't notice the woman trying to get by me Narrow Cold aisle Like me. You say, "I'm sorry." And right in the middle of frozen foods I cry. "Goodbye."

Wow, one of Anthonys friend just messaged me to say he was sorry for everything they said to me. That was wierd, but for some reason now I'm all crying and stuff. I know they were hurting, and I was easiest person to lash out at but still - it's almost easier to have them hate me. It kinda gives you something else to think about, but I guess you can't really get arounhd the fact that no one wants to face.

I keep thinking I'll run into him in the mall or something and just call him a freak like I always did.

I hope he knows I didn't really think eh was one!!!!! hehe... Ok, No more of this topic.. it's depressing me!

Dreams are so weird, esp. nightmares. I woke up 4 times last night, and now I'm not gonna even try and go back to sleep. In 5 hours I'll be exhausted again but it's getting so I'm terrified to go to sleep anymore. Because the dream I keep having, over and over, it terrifying. And I can't get the look of horror on Anthony's face outta my mind. I wish i could have done something, I hope! hope!! hope!!! he wasn't looking out the window, I couldn't handle it if he saw what was happeneing, and I hope it was quick, maybe he didn't even know what happened.... Like I feel guilty to be alive now... I keep falling asleep, convinced I will never wake up again ~ and I don't like this panic I'm struck with in NYC now. I don't think they are done, and what if they get me? Or even worse - get my mom??? I dunno. It's all craziness. I just wish it never happened. I thought that maybe I would sense it when you were gone I thought that maybe It I closed my eyes I would feel where you were But nothing happened And no one heard a word And I can't go to sleep now For I see your fate every night When i close my eyes And darkness pervails Your horror is reflected In the windows of a jet Screaming to claim your life.
http://sugarsweet1983.livejournal.com/2809.html

I just got off the phone with an old friend who couldn't stop crying. It was a guy of course, coz they always seem to be the ones that make it so us girls cry so hard we don't even wanna go on. I told her she could come to NY and spend a few weeks with me but she said there's nothing more she wants to do then stay curled up in bed for a few months. Guys suck. I wonder why I seemed to have gotten the one good then, then I get upset that I had to go thru so many stupid men before I found him.. wouldn't it be great if we met the person perfect for us without being scarred from th past losers? What happens to the losers anyway? Becaus eyou know, when you are like 45 years old there are no more men left, they are all married off, so I guess SOMEONE marries them.... do they just die if they are bad? Nope, they ussaly end up finding a woman with no backbone to cater to thier every wish... isn't life fun? There was something about waking up to the phone ringing Sleepy smiles Hearing your voice from across the world Greeting me with laughter in your voice Gently teasing me as if I had been the one to drive in the wrong lane On the highway late at night. I don't miss the three am calls firected at me so that you Wouldn't fall asleep behinmd the wall of your Life on wheels as you called your Car as you travelled from one end of the world To another and yet never finding time To stop in New York Yet you always said you wanted a cup of my milky smooth coffee. At some point I think I created you into a man you never were Made your eyes a little bluer than they really were Made your hands able to fix everything That goes wrong inside of me And I think I gave you a power reserved for God alone And the the day that I realized When you were in NY for that cup of milky coffee That you just weren't the handyman I thought you were. And I broke so bad I don't think I'll ever be right.

You know.. Cher was really quite the bitch.. I'm one of her biggest fans but she was always pessimistic while Sonny made them famous... 200k a week to do shows in Vegas wasn't good enough for her..... I dunno, I wonder - once you make it, does your personality change????? Are you not who you were before?...... At fifteen years old I ran into the street As the rain poured down my face I could feel the warmth of you Through the T-Shirt you love to wear And you didn't say a word No you didn't say a word You kissed me Unlike I've ever been kissed And I knew you a day I knew you a night Yet it felt like I knew you forever, I wish I hadn't known you a day.

She wraps her body in Saturns silken rings Light waves cascading down a satin smooth back Her eyes half closed to see the shadows Where I linger Afraid to break the spell. Flying stars glide behind her form Lighting her as she makes a melody from her soul I can't hear it but I feel it Surrounding me tighter than Saturns rings As she closes her eyes to the universe.

Life is so crazy, I mean if you really stop and think about, we're all gonna die at some point and thats something that can really get to you you know? I mean, I want to be remembered for somethign great, so that I'm not forgotten... and I don't think modeling is it. That's just somethign I could do well at. But out of the millions and billions of ppl who have lived on earth how many are really known by the average person? 2 hundred, maybe 3 hundred? The worst is thinkign of dying alone, with no one that loves you around you..... that's one of my greatest fears, to die surrounded by starngers, what an awful way to leave this earth, or in pain.. I dunno though, i think dying alone would be the worst. Ok, I'm in a morbid mood tonight..... hehe... Would you rather die and be forgotten? Or die and be hated? Rachel And my heart beats quickly for I am afraid Of losing you And being Alone Again.
